Activity: Arrive at the hospital, check emails, and grab a coffee. Start browsing through some fashion websites.
Oversee the training sessions for nurses and physicians on the updated workflows. Provide support and answer any questions.
Gather feedback from the training participants on the updated workflows and training materials. Make note of any areas for improvement.
Work with @helpdesk-1 to address any technical issues or questions that arise during the training sessions. @PEOPLE: Technical Support During Training
Lunch Break. Enjoy the last day of the work week with colleagues.
Analyze the feedback from the training sessions and identify any necessary revisions to the workflows or training materials.
Communicate any necessary revisions to the relevant team members, including @ehrdev-1, @ehrdev-2, @trainer-1.
Prepare a summary report of the week's activities, including the progress made on the updated workflows, any challenges encountered, and any lessons learned.
Submit the summary report to the appropriate stakeholders.
